entry.title: 用ChatGPT写课程大纲
entry.content:
让ChatGPT 写了6门课的课程大纲，这里展示其中1门课。

Course Title: Information Visualization: Designing Effective and Engaging Visualizations

Course Description: This course will introduce you to the principles and best practices of information visualization, and provide you with the tools and techniques you need to design effective and engaging visualizations for a variety of applications.

Course Goals:

-Understand the principles of information visualization
-Learn how to choose appropriate visualization techniques for different data types and tasks
-Develop skills in designing and implementing visualizations using software tools
-Evaluate the effectiveness and usability of visualizations

Course Outline:

I. Introduction to Information Visualization
-What is information visualization?
-The importance of effective visualization
-Overview of the course

II. Principles of Information Visualization
-Perception and cognition
-Visualization design principles
-Types of visualization techniques

III. Data Types and Visualization Techniques
-Visualizing hierarchical data
-Visualizing temporal and spatial data
-Visualizing network and graph data
-Visualizing multidimensional data

IV. Designing Effective Visualizations
-Defining visualization objectives and tasks
-Designing effective visualizations
-Choosing appropriate visual encoding techniques
-Tools and software for visualization design and development

V. Evaluating and Testing Visualizations
-Principles of user-centered design
-Usability testing and evaluation
-Cognitive walkthroughs and heuristic evaluation
-Gathering feedback and iterating on design

VI. Advanced Topics in Information Visualization
-Interactive visualizations and dashboards
-Visualization for machine learning and AI applications
-Visualization for scientific and engineering data
-Ethical considerations in visualization design and use

VII. Practicing Visualization Design Skills
-Visualization design exercises and assignments
-Group projects and presentations
-Feedback and evaluation

Course Requirements:
-Regular attendance and participation in class
-Completion of assigned readings and exercises
-Active engagement in discussions and group projects
-Final project and presentation

Assessment:
-Class participation and engagement: 20%
-Assignments and exercises: 30%
-Group project and presentation: 30%
-Final project and presentation: 20%

This is just one possible outline for a course on information visualization. Depending on the target audience and course objectives, other topics could be added or removed. The important thing is to provide students with the knowledge and skills they need to create effective and engaging visualizations for a wide range of applications.

The biggest enemy of human

Humans have many enemies, but the biggest enemy of all is themselves.
Human beings have the capacity to create their own problems, and these problems can be caused by a variety of factors.
The most common enemy of humans is their own ignorance. Ignorance can lead to bad decisions, which can have long-term consequences. For example, people may not understand the consequences of their actions, such as the effects of pollution on the environment. Ignorance can also lead to prejudice, which can cause people to make unfair decisions based on false information or stereotypes.
Another enemy of humans is their own greed. Greed can lead people to pursue wealth and power at the expense of others. This can create an unequal society where the rich get richer and the poor get poorer. Greed can also lead to corruption, which can have serious consequences for society.
Finally, humans are their own worst enemy when it comes to their health. People often make poor choices when it comes to their diet and exercise, leading to health problems such as obesity and heart disease. People may also be exposed to dangerous chemicals or pollutants, leading to long-term health problems.

entry.title: 代码编辑器HBuilderX
entry.content:
使用代码编辑器HBuilderX制作网页

HBuilderX，简称HX。 H是HTML的首字母，Builder是构造者，X是HBuilder的下一代版本。
HX既可以是编辑器，也可以是IDE（集成开发环境，使程序员能够整合编写计算机程序的不同方面）。

下载地址：https://www.dcloud.io/hbuilderx.html

支持java插件、nodejs插件，并兼容了很多vscode的插件及代码块。 还可以通过外部命令，方便地调用各种命令行功能，并设置快捷键。

可在网页里引入flourish、tableau、echarts在线数据图。

[参见HX教程] (https://www.dcloud.io/hbuilderx.html)

entry.title: 在线引入Echarts地图遇到的问题
entry.content:
在线地图不符合国家标准问题

在线引入Echarts地图，除了需要引入echarts.min.js，还需要引入china.js，但由于Echarts原有China地图不是国家标准地图，官方已经停用，因此引入Echarts地图会遇到问题。

另外，引入echarts.min.js时，在线引入经常由于在线链接的变化而导致链接失效，导致Echarts无法正常引入。建议下载最新版echarts.min.js，将其置于与index同一文件夹，这样只要写一句引入代码就可以了。

<script src="echarts.min.js">

[参见Echarts教程] (https://echarts.apache.org/zh/tutorial.html)

entry.title: master改为main的影响
entry.content:
用hexo和github搭建个人博客踩的最大的坑
2020年10月1日起，在github上创建的任何新仓库都将使用main作为默认分支，而不是master。

因此，在hexo的_config里，要将以下代码做修改

Deploy
type: git
repo: https://github.com/yourname/yourname.github.io.git
branch: main

注意，branch以前是master，现在要改为main
